headline.main: South Africa Confronts Another Health Problem: Obesity

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Thandi Puoane arrived several months ago at one of the clinics that serve this vast settlement of shacks south of Cape Town with a mandate to make obesity a health priority here. A team of veteran community health educators, almost all of them women, were to meet her.
